meanings: (학문·경제·기술 등의) [명사] development, progress, advance(ment), growth, [동사] develop, advance, grow (=발달)
(전기를 일으킴) electricity generation, generation of electricity

vlive.korean: 굉장히 - 화술이 좀 발전했는데? - 그러게? It's very... - You've become a better talker! - Yeah! 듣기 View video ASTRO : 초콜릿스트로🍫
vlive.english: It's very... - You've become a better talker! - Yeah!
